creditline: Gift of The James Castle Collection, Boise, Idaho
description: interior view with grey room; doorway at R with staircase; figure at L edge; seven rectangular elements between figure and doorway; predominately grey with dark rose, green and black; verso: old lined notebook page with notes on American history
medium: Soot, soot wash, and color of unknown origin on ruled notebook paper
provenance: The artist, Boise, Idaho; Estate of the artist, Boise, Idaho; given to MIA, 2007.
title: Untitled (Interior with figure and seven “friend” constructions)
